mapper.insert: insert into tb_goods_desc (goods_id, introduction, specification_items, custom_attribute_items, item_images, package_list, sale_service) values (#{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specificationItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customAttributeItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemImages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packageList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saleService,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tb_goods_desc set introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, specification_items = #{specificationItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, custom_attribute_items = #{customAttributeItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_images = #{itemImages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, package_list = #{packageList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sale_service = #{saleService,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select goods_id, introduction, specification_items, custom_attribute_items, item_images, package_list, sale_service from tb_goods_desc where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
